title: Djokovic, Chelsea FC Bids, Minor League Wages
itunes:title: Djokovic, Chelsea FC Bids, Minor League Wages
description:
Michael Barr and Mike Lynch discuss Novak Djokovic getting clearance to defend his French Open title, bids for Chelsea FC, and a federal judge's ruling that MLB violated wage law for minor leaguers. All that and more on this Wednesday edition of Bloomberg Business of Sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
